address: Xã Tân Thành, Huyện Bù Đốp, Tỉnh Bình Phước
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit**

Okay, so I'm looking at "Xã Tân Thành, Huyện Bù Đốp, Tỉnh Bình Phước."  My first thought is to check for any province mergers, given the age of the address.  Sure enough, I know from previous resolutions, that Bình Phước and Đồng Nai merged.  I'll need to account for that.

Next, I'll delve into the relevant resolutions, focusing on "Tỉnh Đồng Nai" and anything related to "Tân Thành" in the Bù Đốp district.  I've got a good feeling I'll find something.  Scanning through, I immediately see it: resolution 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically addressing the reorganization of administrative units within Đồng Nai.  There it is - line 49 perfectly matches the old address! It clearly states the merger of "Xã Tân Thành, Tân Tiến (huyện Bù Đốp), Lộc An (huyện Lộc Ninh)" into the new "xã Tân Tiến."  This is exactly what I was looking for.

To be extra certain, I quickly check for any other mentions of "Tân Thành" within the resolution, just to make sure there isn't any ambiguity.  Confirmed: This is the correct "Tân Thành" I'm interested in.

Now, it's just a matter of finding the corresponding ward code for "Xã Tân Tiến" in the "New wards" list for "Tỉnh Đồng Nai".  A quick search reveals the code "25318."

Therefore, my final output will be: the new province is "Tỉnh Đồng Nai," the new ward is "Xã Tân Tiến," with the code "25318."  I can confidently attribute this conclusion to resolution 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically line 49. I have a high degree of confidence in this result given the direct match.

citation.header: 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Đồng Nai
citation.line: 49. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Tân Thành, Tân Tiến (huyện Bù Đốp), Lộc An (huyện Lộc Ninh) thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Tân Tiến.
